entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
